    Map SNPs to genes and assign weights

    compute_gene_pip.Rd

    Map SNPs to genes and assign weights

    compute_gene_pip(
  finemap.gr,
  genomic.annots,
  enhancer_loop_method = "ABC.pcHiC.nearby20kb",
  intron.mode = FALSE,
  c.dist = 1e+05,
  dist.to = c("tss", "midpoint"),
  cols.to.keep = c("snp", "chr", "pos", "pip", "locus", "gene_name", "category",
    "weight", "frac_pip", "gene_pip")
)

    Arguments

    finemap.gr

    Genomic Ranges of fine mapping result.

    genomic.annots

    A list of genomic annotations.

    enhancer_loop_method

    Enhancer loop method

    intron.mode

    Logical. If TRUE, assign intronic SNPs to genes containing the introns.

    c.dist

    A scaling number used for computing weight based on SNP-gene distance. Weight = exp(-dist/c). Default = 1e5 (100kb).

    dist.to

    Option to compute snp-gene distance. Options: 'tss' (default), 'midpoint' (gene midpoint).

    cols.to.keep

    columns to keep in the SNP gene weights

    Value

    A matrix of SNP-to-gene mapping result with gene PIPs

    Contents

    Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Alan Selewa, Xin He.
